name: In the world Unknown
description:
Game by Nastro Studios.

In the world Unknown, is an adventure game created by Nastro Studio, for GMTK game jam 2021.

This is a highly atmospheric game in which, the player is in a very strange dream world and is trapped with an unknown form of light, Now their adventure beings to find out who they really are.....

The ball and the player are connected with an unknown force and their destiny is tied together.......

Presented by Nastro Studios.

Created by Sagar Chauhan.
